title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire #4thStreetFire 09/12/2023 INC#0896

item.description: Update #4thStreetFire Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0896; 02:13PM; 329 E 4th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r9PrB2; #Downtown; With 125 LAFD Firefighters assigned in defensive operations, this incident, known as the "4th Street Fire" is now considered a Major Emergency. Heavy fire continues among dense storage on the second and third floors of the 5,000 square foot three-story (plus basement) commercial building of masonry construction (2 floors originally of 'office' space above first floor commercial). No injury. No evacuation. Two LAFD Public Information Officers (Captain Erik Scott / Captain Adam Van Gerpen) are available at Media Staging: 4th Street & San Pedro Street.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM21 CM22 CM40 CM42 E1 E10 E11 E17 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E227 E235 E27 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 PI1 PI2 RA10 RA211 RA25 RA803 RA827 RA9 RI200 SO1 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T2 T27 T3 T35 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0896; 01:06PM; 329 E 4th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r9PrB2; #Downtown; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations against heavy fire involving dense storage on the third floor of a 5,000 square foot three-story (plus basement) commercial building of masonry construction. ; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM21 CM22 E10 E11 E202 E203 E209 E210 E227 E27 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA10 RA827 RA9 RI200 SO1 SQ21 T10 T2 T27 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 09/11/2023 INC#1130

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1130; 05:20PM; 4163 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Zae6Cd; #HistoricSouthCentral; As a result of visible structural compromise that could lead to collapse of the vacant 150' x 150' two-story commercial building that was on fire earlier today (also the scene of previous fires), the LAFD has summoned the American Red Cross to assist with temporary accommodations for the nine (9) adults, one (1) infant and five (5) pets who reside at a residential fourplex just west of the fire building. Though the residential fourplex did not sustain any direct fire damage, it is within the calculated collapse zone of the fire building, should it fail. The City of Los Angeles Department of Building & Safety has again Red-Tagged the fire building as unfit for entry. The fire's cause remains under active investigation.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC13 CM20 CM22 DT1 E14 E15 E211 E215 E221 E233 E29 E33 E46 E5 EA1 EM11 HE1 JT1 RA15 RA246 RA815 SO1 SQ21 T11 T15 T21 T33 TP1 UA1 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#1310; 04:14PM; 3601 S Potomac Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/45Mtsz4; #Baldwin Hills #Crenshaw; PRELIM: Four vehicle collision, at least one overturned, with a total of seven (7) patients. None of the injuries appear life threatening at this time.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E94 EM11 RA58 RA66 RA826 RA834 RA858 RA92 T94; CH4; 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 09/11/2023 INC#1130

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1130; 03:22PM; 4163 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Zae6Cd; #HistoricSouthCentral; 62 LAFD Firefighters took just 37 minutes in defensive firefighting operations, to access, confine and extinguish heavy fire within a vacant 150' x 150' two-story commercial building, the scene of previous fires. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 CM20 CM22 DT1 E14 E15 E211 E215 E233 E33 E46 E5 EA1 EM11 HE1 RA15 RA246 RA815 SO1 SQ21 T11 T15 T33 TP1 UR5; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1130; 02:45PM; 4163 S Broadway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Zae6Cd; #HistoricSouthCentral; PRELIM: Defensive firefight at a 150' x 150' two-story commercial building, the scene of a previous blaze.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 CM20 CM22 E14 E15 E215 E233 E46 EM11 RA15 RA246 RA815 SO1 SQ21 T15 T33; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision - LAFD Involved; INC#0043; 12:35AM; 13260 W Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/469viKp; #Pacoima; An LAFD Paramedic Rescue Ambulance responding to a medical emergency was struck broadside by a civilian pickup truck at the intersection of Van Nuys Boulevard and San Fernando Road, with the civilian pickup continuing on to collide with a nearby utility pole. The two adult male occupants of the full size pickup truck were badly trapped in the wreckage of their severely damaged truck before being freed by a team of LAFD responders. Both male civilians were transported to a regional trauma center in critical condition. The two male LAFD Paramedics were able to self-extricate from the wreckage of their Type I ambulance, sustaining minor to moderate injuries. Both LAFD Paramedics were taken to an area hospital in fair condition for treatment of injuries that are not considered life threatening. No other persons were injured. The initial medical emergency that the Paramedic team was headed to, was quickly handled successfully by another LAFD crew. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #125).; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 CM40 CM42 E274 E275 E298 E7 E75 EM14 EM15 HR3 RA18 RA75 RA81 RA87 T74 T75 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 09/09/2023 INC#0179

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0179; 04:13AM; 2311 W Fargo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3P9VzBi; #SilverLake; Firefighters encountered heavy fire and excessive storage conditions inside the two-story hillside home. As the incident progressed, crews observed structural weakening and were forced to retreat into defensive mode. Once outside, the structure sustained a partial roof collapse. It took 90 firefighters 35 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E20 E203 E211 E220 E227 E235 E250 E27 E35 E55 E56 E6 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA20 RA3 RA56 RA6 RA803 SO1 T11 T20 T27 T3 T35 T50 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0097; 02:27AM; 876 S Norton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B52VQd; #Koreatown; It took 73 firefighters 37 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames, operating in mostly defensive mode for the duration of the incident (site of previous fires). No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E211 E226 E227 E229 E26 E261 E27 E29 E61 EM11 HR3 RA27 RA29 RA829 T11 T26 T27 T29 T61 UR27 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange
